name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyMifareClassic
summary: Provides access to MIFARE Classic properties and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

parameters.name: sectorIndex
parameters.summary: Index of sector to authenticate, starting from 0.

returns.summary: Returns true on success, false on authentication failure.

parameters.name: sectorIndex
parameters.summary: Index of sector to authenticate, starting from 0.

returns.summary: Returns true on success, false on authentication failure.

methods.name: blockToSector
methods.summary: Return the sector that contains a given block.

parameters.name: blockIndex
parameters.summary: Index of block to lookup, starting from 0.

methods.name: decrement
methods.summary: Decrement a value block, storing the result in the temporary block on the tag.

parameters.name: blockIndex
parameters.summary: Index of block to decrement, starting from 0.

methods.name: getBlockCount
methods.summary: Return the total number of MIFARE Classic blocks.

methods.name: getBlockCountInSector
methods.summary: Return the number of blocks in the given sector.

methods.name: getMaxTransceiveLength
methods.summary: Return the maximum number of bytes that can be sent with transceive.

methods.name: getSectorCount
methods.summary: Return the number of MIFARE Classic sectors.

methods.name: getSize
methods.summary: Return the size of the tag in bytes.

methods.name: getType
methods.summary: Return the type of this MIFARE Classic compatible tag.

methods.name: increment
methods.summary: Increment a value block, storing the result in the temporary block on the tag.

parameters.name: blockIndex
parameters.summary: Index of block to increment, starting from 0.

parameters.name: blockIndex
parameters.summary: Index of block to read, starting from 0.

methods.name: restore
methods.summary: Copy from a value block to the temporary block.

methods.name: sectorToBlock
methods.summary: Return the first block of a given sector.

parameters.name: sectorIndex
parameters.summary: Index of sector to lookup, starting from 0.

methods.name: transceive
methods.summary: Send raw NfcA data to the tag and receive the response.

methods.name: transfer
methods.summary: Copy from the temporary block to a value block.

parameters.name: blockIndex
parameters.summary: Index of block to write, starting from 0.

constants.name: KEY_MIFARE_APPLICATION_DIRECTORY
constants.summary: The well-known key for tags formatted according to the MIFARE Application Directory (MAD) specification.

constants.name: KEY_NFC_FORUM
constants.summary: The well-known key for tags formatted according to the NDEF on MIFARE Classic specification.
